attributes.action: Legalise segway balance board let them be rode on paths like mobility scooters
attributes.additional_details:
Proof of ban- http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/technology-science/technology/segways-hoverboard-scooters-illegal-uk-6618787

Laws - http://www.govyou.co.uk/legalize-segways-go-peds-and-other-personal-electric-transporters/

This is an unnecessary ban and another way to makeep money from us!!
attributes.background: So hoverboards,segways or even balance boards have been made illegal unless used on private land with permission. based on a law made in the late 1800s, the law was made for carriages etc and it's not right as mobility scooters are excluded from this. why shouldn't the segways be excluded also?
